cofh.api.energy

Interface IEnergyConnection

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IEnergyHandler, IEnergyProvider, IEnergyReceiver
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TileEnergyHandler

    public interface IEnergyConnection
    Implement this interface on TileEntities which should connect to energy transportation blocks. This is intended for blocks which generate energy but do not accept it; otherwise just use IEnergyHandler.

    Note that IEnergyHandler is an extension of this.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canConnectEnergy(ForgeDirection from)
      Returns TRUE if the TileEntity can connect on a given side.

    • Method Detail

      • canConnectEnergy

        boolean canConnectEnergy(ForgeDirection from)
        Returns TRUE if the TileEntity can connect on a given side.
